title: restore back up from the google cloud
content:
need help..... here's what happened. my fingerprint scanner on my pixel 3 suddenly stop working and it's asking for my screen lock pin. 

I forgot my pin so what I did, I factory reset my phone through the bootloader menu. 
on the set up its ask for my pin or gmail account. so I entered my google account instead. 
then on the setup screen where I can select the Pixel 3 backup yesterday, when I tap on it. it's asking for my lock screen and there's no option to continue..

 so what I did I set it up as new. set up another pin and do the factory reset again.  (as if I forgot my screen lock pin) 

on the screen where I can select the Pixel 3 back up,  its still asking for my screen lock pin. I entered the current pin I created before I factory reset and still doesn't work. 


Does anyone here encounter this problem?
please help. I really want to restore my back up. 


Thanks!
